pkgmetadata.longdescription: MBSTS Models for Causal Inference and Forecasting // Infers the causal effect of an intervention on a multivariate response through the use of Multivariate Bayesian Structural Time Series models (MBSTS) as described in Menchetti Bojinov (2020) arXiv:2006.12269. The package also includes functions for model building and forecasting.
